title: Short-Intensive Course for Language Proficiency Enhancement Through Experiential Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational linguistics knowledge and practical experience in specialized domains (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: A large-scale language expert program conducted in a smartphone-based limited technological environment, with a focus on recontextualization strategies to enhance job relevance

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language problems encountered in real work situations and propose at least three solutions
Learners can redesign language usage contexts with over 80% accuracy by applying theory to practical case studies
Learners can complete a digital portfolio sharing experiential learning outcomes through collaboration with peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
